long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About Classbee:

Classbee is Online Class Lecture recording and Playback app for students.

It is a free, simple and ultra versatile online class screen recorder tool for Chrome. It is quick and simple to install and get using immediately. Both chrome tab capture and full desktop capture is supported.

This version is specially build for students who can 

1. Record Online Class easily in click of buttons.
2. Add Session name like Maths, Science before starting the recording.
3. All your recordings are permanently saved in your downloads folder.
4. Playback your sessions at any later time from dashboard.
5. Filter recordings based on date and session name.

Features:
1.Tab Capture and Desktop Feature supported.
2. Pause/Resume recording from overlay buttons.
3. Record videos in High/Medium and Low quality.
4. Videos are saved in seekable webm format.
5. Chrome mute site option available. This allows you to do other things in other tabs while the recording (with audio) takes place in the background. 
Unlimited video recording minutes.
6. Use VLC and chrome browser to playback recorded videos.
7. Annotate on your recordings. (Coming soon)
8. Share your recordings. (Coming soon)
9. Sync your recordings to Google drive. (Coming soon)
